title: 6.DA.3
text: The student will make predictions and draw conclusions from data visualizations.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Visualize data using appropriate graphs, charts, and data visualization techniques to enhance understanding and communicate findings effectively.
Use computational tools to analyze patterns within data sets and identify trends.
Draw conclusions and make predictions based on the analysis and interpretation of the data visualization.
Utilize simulations and models to formulate, refine, and test hypotheses.
